name: Waifu's Bricks - Anime
description:
In Waifu Bricks you play the classic game of  stack blocks but this time with Anime Waifus. 

.There are 19 Waifus that can be unlocked with points.

. Points are earned by playing the classic or  "Save The Waifu" modes.

.There are more waifus to come, leave suggestions.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Luis&ah=kdgJS7_kDiEDmNydosnqCZ...
